title: [Feature] Community-Requested: Enhanced Replay
body:
## Summary

Based on community feedback from 1 users:

- Suggestion: Add a replay system and theater mode.

This feature would enhance the player experience while maintaining our F2P-friendly approach.
Engagement metrics suggest high community interest in this area.

## Details

- **Category:** replay
- **Priority Score:** 0.75
- **Monetization Type:** qol
- **F2P Compliant:** ✅ Yes

## Source

This feature was generated from community feedback analysis.
- **Source Insights:** 1 community inputs

## Competitive Analysis

- [Age of Origins] social: Implement guild system without pay-to-win territory bonuses. Focus on cosmetic guild customization.
- [Age of Origins] customization: Offer cosmetic-only commander skins. Any stat-affecting commanders should be earnable by all.
- [Age of Origins] AVOID: VIP system with subscription benefits - not F2P adaptable

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Feature implemented as described
- [ ] F2P guardrails validated
- [ ] No gameplay advantages for paid content
- [ ] Unit tests added
- [ ] Documentation updated

---

*This issue was auto-generated by the Thirsty's Game Studio Agent System.*

title: [Feature] Community-Requested: Enhanced Social
body:

title: [Feature] Community-Requested: Enhanced Profile
body:
## Summary

Based on community feedback from 1 users:

- Can we get more profile customization? Banners, borders, titles - all cosmetic stuff that shows progression.

This feature would enhance the player experience while maintaining our F2P-friendly approach.
Engagement metrics suggest high community interest in this area.

## Details

- **Category:** profile
- **Priority Score:** 0.23
- **Monetization Type:** qol
- **F2P Compliant:** ✅ Yes

## Source

This feature was generated from community feedback analysis.
- **Source Insights:** 1 community inputs

## Competitive Analysis

- [Age of Origins] customization: Offer cosmetic-only commander skins. Any stat-affecting commanders should be earnable by all.
- [Age of Origins] progression: Multiple progression paths but equal time investment for all players. No paid speedups.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Feature implemented as described
- [ ] F2P guardrails validated
- [ ] No gameplay advantages for paid content
- [ ] Unit tests added
- [ ] Documentation updated
